title: Is Donald Trump the only major party candidate in 40 years who has not released his tax returns?
text: On 19 September 2016, the Wisconsin Democratic Party invited Donald Trump to release his tax returns and issued a statement quoting Mr. Tammy Baldwin, D-Wiss: "It is too late to release Donald Trump from his tax returns, as every other major party candidate has done over the past 40 years." So let's see if that's what every democratic and Republican presidential candidate has done since 1976. The Waipak Baldwin machine has been targeting Trump since he became JOP candidate.
